products.name: üïäÔ∏è SALAAM EXCLUSIVE üïäÔ∏è
products.description:
This 'Salaam' hijab is more than just a piece of clothing‚Äîit‚Äôs a symbol of hope, solidarity, and the strength of women. The word 'Salaam,' meaning peace, is beautifully woven into the fabric, serving as a gentle reminder of the power of kindness and unity. But what truly makes this hijab special is the cause it represents. Each purchase helps support the women of Gaza, who have shown incredible resilience and strength despite the challenges they face. By wearing this hijab, you're not only embracing a beautiful design, but you're also standing alongside these women, offering them your support and love. The soft, lightweight fabric makes it a joy to wear, while the deeper meaning behind it fills your heart with purpose. This hijab is a way to wear your values and contribute to a brighter, more peaceful future for those who need it most.

Material: 100% Modal.

This hijab is not only stylish but also easy to care for. Simply hand wash it in cold water and hang it to dry for long-lasting softness and color.
